Question: Which of the following statements are true regarding Benicio del Toro's role in the Marvel Cinematic Universe?
Options:
A. a) Benicio del Toro portrays The Collector.
B. b) The Collector is known for his vast collection of interstellar relics.
C. c) The Collector is one of the Elders of the Universe.
D. d) The Collector is a member of the Avengers.
Answer: a) Benicio del Toro portrays The Collector., b) The Collector is known for his vast collection of interstellar relics., c) The Collector is one of the Elders of the Universe.
